column4: is there a way I can make my machine reboot and force a boot from the cd drive?
I don't think you can tell the machine what to boot from from the OS, but if you reboot then (on most computers) hit a button like F12
And select the boot device from there (@ Anonissimus )
problem is this is a virtual machine
so I dont get the boot menu
I think you can do it uh
Stop your VM, open up the settings, and change it there
I don't think you can force a reboot to a different device though
I am pretty sure I can, but I cant find it otherwise I wouldnt ask
The only way I know how to do it in VMWare is to change your VM settings
found I can get into the boot menu by checking a box
